Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Establishes a deferred retirement option plan for certain employees of the department of corrections and community supervision and the office of mental health
Summary: Establishes a deferred retirement option plan for certain employees of the department of corrections and community supervision and the office of mental health; directs service costs attributable to implementing the DROP program to be paid by New York state.
LawCode: Add Art 14-C ยง570, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to establishing a deferred retirement option plan for certain employees of the department of corrections and community supervision and the office of mental health
